title: Chat is Buggy
body:
The chat on the client is super buggy. It's showing older messages where it should show new messages. Then, when I scroll up to the conversation, it injects random older messages into our conversation. It's got me feelin' like this-
 http://goo.gl/kjPQ7v

There are no time stamps either :'( 

I do like the clean layout and that it looks like the mobile app. Just super buggy rn.

replies.body: Yeah I have noticed that as well. Might have something to do with how the messages got synced to the Alpha Client.
Hey, thanks for the info. I've noted down the issue you're experiencing for the devs, as for time stamps â€” do they show up on hover of the individual message?
Yeah they show up like they were just sent and not like they were older messages. TImestamps show up when hovering.
Some of my old messages actually disappeared uhhhh
sometimes when i msg my friends, my msgs wont show up till they msg me back

My quick fix is to delete the conversatiion history, or delete it periodically. Still, someone rioter should get a look at this, because a _lot_ of funny jokes end up getting erased just so I can use chat properly :(
